thread.title: U-Haul Property to Meet Peachtree City's Moving, Storage Needs
thread.title_full: U-Haul Property to Meet Peachtree City's Moving, Storage Needs - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: U-Haul Property to Meet Peachtree City's Moving, Storage Needs
text:
U-Haul
PEACHTREE CITY, Ga. , Sept. 24, U-Haul Company of Georgia is pleased to meet the growing demand for moving and storage in Fayette County with the opening of its new store at 375 Highway 74 S. in Peachtree City .
U-Haul Moving & Storage of Starrs Mills is now offering truck, trailer and U-Box rentals as well as moving supplies. General manager Claudia Campbell said there is much more to come in the next year.
The 14.12-acre property includes 385 Highway 74 S., where a secondary building of 44,644 square feet will serve as a warehouse for hundreds of U-Box containers among other things. The main building at 375 Highway 74 S. boasts 70,708 square feet, houses the showroom and will soon showcase 1,240 self-storage units. Storage and propane availability, an updated showroom and additional renovations could be ready by the end of summer 2016 if the necessary approvals are granted in a timely fashion.
"I'm excited about how much this business is needed and the awesome feedback I'm receiving from citizens in the area," Campbell said. "This means convenience. Where people would have traveled more than 10 miles to reach a full-service U-Haul, we are now literally in their backyard. We are a friendly staff eager to serve customers the absolute best way we know how. We will always have their best interest at heart when helping to make their move stress-free."
U-Haul Moving & Storage of Starrs Mills will feature a new 5,000-square-foot showroom and an updated warehouse with hitch bays and docking when completed. The main building, which has 26-foot ceilings, will get a second floor to double the amount of square footage available for storage.
The acquisition of U-Haul Moving & Storage of Starrs Mills was driven by U-Haul Company's Corporate Sustainability initiatives : U-Haul supports infill development to help local communities lower their carbon footprint. Our adaptive reuse of existing buildings reduces the amount of energy and resources required for new-construction materials and helps cities reduce their unwanted inventory of unused buildings.
Contact U-Haul Moving and Storage of Starrs Mills at (678) 619-3056 or visit the store from 8 a.m.-5 p.m. Monday-Saturday and 9 a.m. 2-p.m. Sunday. Reserve equipment at uhaul.com or contact U-Haul Reservations at 1-800-GO-UHAUL.
To learn more about U-Haul in the news, visit myuhaulstory.com .
About U-Haul
